name: Pregnancy Testing & Planning
description: Whether you want to plan for a future pregnancy, need a pregnancy test, or are trying to understand your pregnancy options, Planned Parenthood is here to help. The expert and caring staff at your local Planned Parenthood health center can talk with you about all of your pregnancy testing and planning questions or concerns. We offer services in: - Fertility and pregnancy planning - Infertility support and referrals - Pregnancy dating (ultrasound) - Pregnancy options counseling - Adoption informat

whatTheyOffer: Whether you want to plan for a future pregnancy, need a pregnancy test, or are trying to understand your pregnancy options, Planned Parenthood is here to help. The expert and caring staff at your local Planned Parenthood health center can talk with you about all of your pregnancy testing and planning questions or concerns. We offer services in: - Fertility and pregnancy planning - Infertility support and referrals - Pregnancy dating (ultrasound) - Pregnancy options counseling - Adoption informat
howToGetIt: Talk to Planned Parenthood staff online or in-person at your local health center to get the care you need. Make an appointment online or call 1-800-230-PLAN. Not every Planned Parenthood health center provides all services. Check with your nearest Planned Parenthood health center about the services they offer.
agency: Planned Parenthood - San Francisco Health Center
